page.title: 16 WHAT I ENJOY DOING MOST.
page.content: Sailing is my most enjoyable pastime although I also enjoy photography.I have not got a boat of my own yet,but I am gradually saving up and with the help of a holiday job I should be able to afford one by next season,1986. At the moment I use the schools boat or I crew for someone else.The closest available water to me is Pitsford reservoir although I usually go to Grafton where we sail Minor and Enterprise class boats generally on a Wednesday afternoon. As a member of the C.C.F.(Naval section),I get a lot of opportunity to pursue my hobby.Sailing may seem a very passive sport but in a force 5 or 6 gusting it is not only exhausting but also exhilarating.
